title: Revised St. Louis Conference Videos
post: Thanks Russ for all your effort/and money in bringing those videos to back life
author: Mike M

title: Revised St. Louis Conference Videos
post: Russ…….I agree with Mike M.  Thanks for all your effort, time and money in making the St. Louis Shroud Conference available online!
author: David O.

title: Revised St. Louis Conference Videos
post: Thanks Mike and David.  It is my happy contribution.  Barrie does Shroud.com–the world’s primary archive and research site, Dan does the daily blog and I try to do streaming media.  Seems like a good balance of labor and resources.
author: Russ Breault
